about.title: ABOUT ME
about.bio: Fullstack application developer specialized in Java & Javascript. Driven by natural curiosity and unwavering perseverance, I enjoy tackling various technical challenges. Moreover, my openness to learning new technologies allows me to innovate and continuously adapt to the ever-evolving demands of the development field.

projects.description: Design & development of a sports app API
Design and creation of an employee management platform

cfa.description: Project carried out during my apprenticeship year, aiming to create an innovative platform to simplify user management and document creation for Dawan employees.

fa.description: Backend design and implementation of a Java/React Native sports application. Data Model design, REST Controller, double token authentication, WebSocket, Pair programming.

jws.description: Design and development of a minimalist web server in Java, supporting GET requests, static files, and dynamic content, with multithreaded management for enhanced performance.

pdc.description: Full Stack application developed with Django Ninja and React, providing statistical analysis on drug consumption and personality.

portfolio.description: A portfolio dedicated to showcasing my skills, achievements, and projects.
